##環境設置
```{r}
Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL","Chinese")  #解決中文亂碼問題


library(dplyr); library(stringr); library(ggplot2); library(plotly); library(lubridate); library(readr); library(tidyr); library(showtext); 
library(ggpubr);

font_add("QYuan","cwTeXQYuan-Medium.ttf") # 新增字體
showtext_auto(enable=TRUE) #啟用字體
theme_set(theme_classic())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(out.width='80%', fig.asp=.75, fig.align='center', fig.showtext=T)

```

##作圖
```{r}
library(readr)
money123 <- read_csv("C:/Users/Leo jay/Desktop/money123.csv",
locale = locale(encoding = "BIG5"))
View(money123)


money123 %>% 
  gather(M1A,M2,
    key = "貨幣種類",value="貨幣供給/百萬"
  ) %>% mutate(
    `年`=as.integer(year),
    `貨幣種類/百萬`=as.factor(貨幣種類)
  ) %>% 
  ggplot()+ 
  geom_line(aes(x=`年`,y=`貨幣供給/百萬`,color=`貨幣種類/百萬`),size=1,alpha=0.8)+
  geom_point(aes(x=`年`,y=`貨幣供給/百萬`,color=`貨幣種類/百萬`))+
  theme_grey()+
  ggtitle(label = "貨幣流動性高低關係")



```
